titleStmt.title: SII 14.208: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 208. (A.R. No. 30 of 1909.) KUṈṈAKKUḌI, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE ROCK LEFT OF ENTRANCE INTO THE FIRST CAVE TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription dated in the 4th year of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Śrīvallabha, seems to register the gift of land made tax-free in Kīḻkkaṇṇamaṅgalam by Adāḷaiyūr-nāṭṭāḻvāṉ Mummuḍiśōḻaṉ Vīraśēkharaṉ.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tirumaṭantaiyuñ jaya
maṭanataiyum tiruppuyaṅkaḷiliniti
ruppa Irunilamum perumaiyeyta Eṇ
ṭicaiyuṅ kuṭai niḻaṟṟa maṉṉavarellām
vantiṟaiñca marapile varumaṇimuṭi cū
ṭitteṉkumariyum vaṭakaṅkaiyu
n tiraikkaṭale yellaiyāka(ka)ppa
� muḻutuṅ kayalāṇai parantu ceṅ
koluṭaṉ vaḷara virasiṅhāsaṉa
ttu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāḷuṭaṉ vīṟṟi
runtaruḷiya māmutal tikkulam viḷa
kkiṭak komutaṟk koccaṭaiyapaṉma
rāṉa tribhuvanacakravattikaḷ śrīvalla
vadevaṟku yāṇṭu 4 Āvatu keraḷaci
ṅkavaḷanāṭṭu Ataḷaiyūrnāṭṭut teṉā
ṟṟuppokkut tirukkuṉṟakkuṭit tirumalai
yil śrīmulastāna muṭaiya nāyaṉārkku
Iṉṉāṭṭu Ataḷaiyūr nāṭṭāḻvāṉ mu
mamuṭicoḻaṉ viracekaranen kiḻk(ka)ka
ṇṇamaṅkalattu Eṉṉopātiyāl
vanta Iṟai kuṭimai kaṭamaiyum puṟa
viṟai Antarāyam EppeṟpaṭṭatuIncomplete.
Digital edition of SII 14.208 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
